Input arguments for each method¶

Main script¶

main¶

[OPTIONS] = overlap | domino | multixrank | networkCreation

Analyse the link between environmental factors and rare disease pathways. Select the approach you want to perform :

overlap | domino | multixrank

If you need to create a network with the pathways of interest, select : networkCreation

main [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]...

Options

--version¶

Show the version and exit.

Commands

domino

Active Module Identification analysis

multixrank

Random Walk with Restart Analysis

networkCreation

Create network and bipartite

overlap

Perform overlap analysis

Overlap¶

main overlap¶

Perform overlap analysis between genes targeted by chemicals and Rare Diseases pathways from WikiPathway

main overlap [OPTIONS]

Options

-f, --factorList <factorListFile>¶

Factors list data file name

-c, --CTD_file <CTD_file>¶

CTD request result file name

-g, --geneList <geneListFile>¶

Genes list data file name

--directAssociation <directAssociation>¶

True: Only chem targets False:Chem + descendants targets

Default

True

--nbPub <nbPub>¶

Number of references needed at least to keep an interaction

Default

2

--GMT <pathOfInterestGMT>¶

Pathways of interest in GMT like format. NOTE: This argument is required if backgroundFile chosen.

--backgroundFile <backgroundFile>¶

Background genes file name. NOTE: This argument is required if pathOfInterestGMT chosen.

-o, --outputPath <outputPath>¶

Output folder name

Default

OutputResults

DOMINO¶

main domino¶

DOMINO defines the target genes as active genes and search active modules through a given network.

main domino [OPTIONS]

Options

-f, --factorList <factorListFile>¶

Factors list data file name

-c, --CTD_file <CTD_file>¶

CTD request result file name

-g, --geneList <geneListFile>¶

Genes list data file name

--directAssociation <directAssociation>¶

True: Only chem targets False:Chem + descendants targets

Default

True

--nbPub <nbPub>¶

Number of references needed at least to keep an interaction

Default

2

-n, --networkFile <networkFile>¶

Required Network file name

--GMT <pathOfInterestGMT>¶

Pathways of interest in GMT like format. NOTE: This argument is required if backgroundFile chosen.

--backgroundFile <backgroundFile>¶

Background genes file name. NOTE: This argument is required if pathOfInterestGMT chosen.

-o, --outputPath <outputPath>¶

Output folder name

Default

OutputResults

RWR¶

main multixrank¶

Performs a Random Walk with Restart through heterogeneous multilayer using the target genes as seeds

main multixrank [OPTIONS]

Options

-f, --factorList <factorListFile>¶

Factors list data file name

-c, --CTD_file <CTD_file>¶

CTD request result file name

-g, --geneList <geneListFile>¶

Genes list data file name

--directAssociation <directAssociation>¶

True: Only chem targets False:Chem + descendants targets

Default

True

--nbPub <nbPub>¶

Number of references needed at least to keep an interaction

Default

2

--configPath <configPath>¶

Required Configurations path name

--networksPath <networksPath>¶

Required Network directory path

--seedsFile <FILENAME>¶

Required Seeds file path name

--sifFileName <FILENAME>¶

Required Name of the output file network SIF

--top <top>¶

Top number of results to write into output file

Default

10

-o, --outputPath <outputPath>¶

Output folder name

Default

OutputResults

Network creation¶

main networkCreation¶

Create network SIF file from WP request or pathways of interest GMT file

main networkCreation [OPTIONS]

Options

--networksPath <networksPath>¶

Required Output path where save the network

--networksName <FILENAME>¶

Network output name

Default

WP_RareDiseasesNetwork.sif

--bipartitePath <bipartitePath>¶

Required Output path where save the bipartite

--bipartiteName <FILENAME>¶

Bipartite output name

Default

Bipartite_WP_RareDiseases_geneSymbols.tsv

--GMT <pathOfInterestGMT>¶

Pathways of interest in GMT like format (e.g. from WP request).

-o, --outputPath <outputPath>¶

Output path name (for complementary output files)

Default

OutputResults

Important

--factorList, --CTD_file and --geneList options are exclusive, only one has to be use. This three input are required

Important

--backgroundFile and --GMT options have always to be given together.
